title: Bug 103963: Missing Friendly Error Message for Empty Series
description: The current issue involves the absence of a friendly error message when there is no data for a series.
OB: No error message is displayed when there is no data for a series.
EB: If there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user of the absence of data.
SR:
1. Attempt to view a series with no data.
   2. Observe the absence of a friendly error message.
